SEARCH
Package com.cytech.classeTestsUnitaires

Class TestGestionLienParenteBDD

java.lang.Object
com.cytech.classeTestsUnitaires.TestGestionLienParenteBDD
public class TestGestionLienParenteBDD extends Object
Test class for GestionLienParenteBDD functionality. This class contains unit tests for various methods in the GestionLienParenteBDD class, including tests for retrieving deceased and living persons, men and women, and testing relationship registration in the database.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to run all tests for GestionLienParenteBDD. Executes all test methods and displays a summary of results.

    • testRecupererPersonnesDecedees

      public static void testRecupererPersonnesDecedees()
      Tests the recupererPersonnesDecedees method. Verifies that the method correctly retrieves deceased persons from the database.

    • testRecupererPersonnesVivantes

      public static void testRecupererPersonnesVivantes()
      Tests the recupererPersonnesVivantes method. Verifies that the method correctly retrieves living persons from the database.

    • testRecupererFemmes

      public static void testRecupererFemmes()
      Tests the recupererFemmes method. Verifies that the method correctly retrieves women from the database.

    • testRecupererHommes

      public static void testRecupererHommes()
      Tests the recupererHommes method. Verifies that the method correctly retrieves men from the database.

    • testEnregistrerLienDansBDD

      public static void testEnregistrerLienDansBDD()
      Tests the enregistrerLienDansBDD method. Verifies that the method correctly registers different types of relationships in the database.

    • testAvecIdArbreInexistant

      public static void testAvecIdArbreInexistant()
      Tests behavior with non-existent tree ID. Verifies that the methods handle non-existent tree IDs gracefully.

    • testMethodesPersonne

      public static void testMethodesPersonne()
      Tests basic Personne class methods. Verifies the constructor and basic getter methods of the Personne class.

    • afficherResultats

      public static void afficherResultats()
      Displays a summary of all test results. Shows the total number of tests, passed tests, failed tests, and success rate.
